name: Worker
text: I'm just around here working for the 'Red Company'

name: Worker
text: We are out here chopping down all these trees

name: Worker
text: Yeah, we gotta make profit somehow!

name: Worker
text: Can you get me 2 Sticks for some money? i'm getting tired

name: You
text: Yeah, I guess I can help

name: Worker
text: There are 2 Slimes Monesters down there

name: Worker
text: Can you kill them and get me their slimes?

name: You
text: That's horrible! Do you now where he is ?

name: Queen
text: Yes, he was taken inside this cave, it's too dangerous

name: You
text: Don't worry, i will resuce him!

name: Farmer
text: They keep fleeing to the north road

name: You
text: Okay, I will see what I can do
